required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long-term Clinical Feasibility of the New Indwelling Provox Vega 20 Voice Prosthesis
clinical_study.official_title: Amendment on Phase I Trial NO7VEG 'Assessment of a Next Generation Indwelling Provox Voice Rehabilitation System (Vega)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate long-term clinical feasibility of a new voice prosthesis and insertion system Provox Vega 20 with SmartInserter) for voice rehabilitation after total laryngectomy. Outcome measures are voice quality, ease of insertion, device life, and reason for replacement.

clinical_study.why_stopped: Primary endpoint reached, slow accrual, leakage around

primary_outcome.time_frame: at replacement of voice prosthesis (maximum 1 year)
primary_outcome.description: Device life was measured from the time of insertion until the time of replacement. Reason for replacement was recorded. Only replacements for leakage through the device are considered for calculation of device life time.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 3 months or device change (whichever was first)
secondary_outcome.description: Subjective patient opinion about 5 voice related items (intelligibility face to face and on the phone, loudness, pitch and fluency). The best value is 5 and the worst value is 20.

The Vega voice prosthesis used in this study is inserted with a new insertion tool, the SmartInserter. Physicians were asked to rate the insertion on a 4 point scale. what they thought of the new insertion tool, also in comparison to the regular tool used in the clinic, the Provox2 inserter. As the Provox voice prosthesis is a tool physicians already used, no insertions were performed with the Provox2 inserter during the study.

intervention.description: The current Provox2 voice prosthesis of laryngectomized patients will, when the patient comes in for a change, be replaced with a new, next generation Provox Vega voice prosthesis and insertion system

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- total laryngectomy
- use Provox2 voice prosthesis
- at least two prior prosthesis changes
Exclusion Criteria:
- current puncture problems (f. ex. infection)

overall_official.last_name: Michiel WM van den Brekel, MD, PhD

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Patients were recruited at the outpatient clinic when they came in for a voice prosthesis replacement.

group.title: Provox Vega 20
group.description: 26 Patients who normally use a Provox2 voice prosthesis, were asked to use a new Vega voice prosthesis with an outer diameter of 20 French.

group.title: Provox Vega 20
group.description: 26 Patients who normally use a Provox2 voice prosthesis, were asked to use a new Vega voice prosthesis with an outer diameter of 20 French.

outcome.title: Device Life Time
outcome.description: Device life was measured from the time of insertion until the time of replacement. Reason for replacement was recorded. Only replacements for leakage through the device are considered for calculation of device life time.
outcome.time_frame: at replacement of voice prosthesis (maximum 1 year)
outcome.population: In 16 out of the 26 patients, the device was replaced for leakage through the device. These 16 devices were considered for calculation of device life time.

group.title: Provox Vega 20
group.description: 26 Patients who normally use a Provox2 voice prosthesis, were asked to use a new Vega voice prosthesis with an outer diameter of 20 French.

measure.title: Device Life Time
measure.description: Device life was measured from the time of insertion until the time of replacement. Reason for replacement was recorded. Only replacements for leakage through the device are considered for calculation of device life time.
measure.population: In 16 out of the 26 patients, the device was replaced for leakage through the device. These 16 devices were considered for calculation of device life time.

outcome.title: Voice Quality
outcome.description: Subjective patient opinion about 5 voice related items (intelligibility face to face and on the phone, loudness, pitch and fluency). The best value is 5 and the worst value is 20.
outcome.time_frame: at 3 months or device change (whichever was first)
outcome.population: 23 patients completed the structured questionnaires about the voice prosthesis. One patient received the wrong voice prosthesis after inclusion. Two patients had unsolvable leakage around the Provox Vega 20, which is 2.5 French smaller in outer diameter than their previous Provox2 voice prosthesis.

group.title: Provox Vega 20
group.description: 26 Patients who normally use a Provox2 voice prosthesis, were asked to use a new Vega voice prosthesis with an outer diameter of 20 French.

measure.title: Voice Quality
measure.description: Subjective patient opinion about 5 voice related items (intelligibility face to face and on the phone, loudness, pitch and fluency). The best value is 5 and the worst value is 20.
measure.population: 23 patients completed the structured questionnaires about the voice prosthesis. One patient received the wrong voice prosthesis after inclusion. Two patients had unsolvable leakage around the Provox Vega 20, which is 2.5 French smaller in outer diameter than their previous Provox2 voice prosthesis.

outcome.title: Ease of Insertion
outcome.description: The Vega voice prosthesis used in this study is inserted with a new insertion tool, the SmartInserter. Physicians were asked to rate the insertion on a 4 point scale. what they thought of the new insertion tool, also in comparison to the regular tool used in the clinic, the Provox2 inserter. As the Provox voice prosthesis is a tool physicians already used, no insertions were performed with the Provox2 inserter during the study.
outcome.population: All patients included for insertion evaluation

measure.description: The Vega voice prosthesis used in this study is inserted with a new insertion tool, the SmartInserter. Physicians were asked to rate the insertion on a 4 point scale. what they thought of the new insertion tool, also in comparison to the regular tool used in the clinic, the Provox2 inserter. As the Provox voice prosthesis is a tool physicians already used, no insertions were performed with the Provox2 inserter during the study.
measure.population: All patients included for insertion evaluation

outcome.title: Reason for Replacement
outcome.population: 1 patient had his Vega inappropriately removed and received a Provox2.

group.title: Provox Vega 20
group.description: 26 Patients who normally use a Provox2 voice prosthesis, were asked to use a new Vega voice prosthesis with an outer diameter of 20 French.

measure.title: Reason for Replacement
measure.population: 1 patient had his Vega inappropriately removed and received a Provox2.

class.title: periprosthetic leakage due to smaller diameter

reported_events.time_frame: Adverse events were recorded from the time the new Vega prosthesis was inserted until the voice prosthesis was replaced.
reported_events.desc: Adverse events were assessed after the insertion procedure, upon notification of a problem by the patient, and when the Provox Vega needed replacement. Normal reasons for replacement (leakage through, size changes) were not considered adverse events.

group.title: Provox Vega 20
group.description: 26 Patients who normally use a Provox2 voice prosthesis, were asked to use a new Vega voice prosthesis with an outer diameter of 20 French.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
